name: Cat Vitae
description:
Tired of your current job? Write down your CV and get a new job! But wait.... Will your cat let you do it? Cat Vitae it's a multiplayer game! One player takes the role of the human (Write down your cv), and the other player takes the role of the cat (Annoy your owner). This is all for your own personal growth,

There's no need to host or anything! The game uses a dedicated hosting. You only need to join and create a room to play! 

If there no one to play with, you can boot up another instance of the game and try it!

In the case that the server goes down, there's the possibility in the options menu to use a different IP. In any case, here's the IP for the server (I'll keep this updated):  35.202.226.51

Art, music and programming by Coco kapybara and Lord Avocado
